text: Tini allaha, yini bayu prerana karena, atahpara ta meghamalake sancarita kare. Atahpara tini meghamalake yebhabe iccha akase chariye dena ebam take stare stare rakhena. Erapara tumi dekhate pa'o tara madhya theke nirgata haya brstidhara. Tini tamra bandadera madhye yaderake iccha paumchana; takhana tara anandita haya.
